wikipedia_page.main: Ian McDonald (born 5 February 1951) is a Scottish former footballer who made 25 appearances in the Football League playing as a midfielder for Darlington in the 1970s. He was on the books of Wolverhampton Wanderers, without representing them in the League, and went on to play non-league football for Whitley Bay.

response: * Ian McDonald (civil servant) (1936–2019), Ministry of Defence spokesman during the Falklands War
